thread.title: Former Chinese Oil Executive Sentenced for Corruption
thread.title_full: Former Chinese Oil Executive Sentenced for Corruption - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Former Chinese Oil Executive Sentenced for Corruption
text:
A Chinese court on Tuesday sentenced a former senior executive of a state oil company to 20 years in prison after finding him guilty of corruption.
The sentencing of Wang Yongchun, a former deputy general manager of China National Petroleum Corp., came a day after a former CNPC chairman, Jiang Jiemin, was given 16 yearsâ€™ imprisonment for...
